original_title: Consuming Love; or, St. Valentine's Day in Greenaway Land
overview: Tommy and Jimmy are very much in love with Dolly. Their appetites however, very much overbalance their affections. Joe, who is not over blessed with this world's wealth, but who is bountifully blessed with chivalry, is favored by Dolly. Tom and Jim decide to get her a valentine.
title: Consuming Love; or, St. Valentine's Day in Greenaway Land
